mapper.select: select sum(ptotal) from payment where extract(month from pdate) = extract(month from sysdate) and prefund is null
select sum(ptotal) from payment where extract(year from pdate) = extract(year from sysdate) and prefund is null
select pmethod,count(pmethod) cnt from payment where prefund is null group by pmethod
select extract(month from sysdate) month from dual
select extract(year from sysdate) year from dual

select lv,nvl(ptotal,0) ptotal from (SELECT LPAD(LEVEL, 2, '0') LV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) cnt left outer join (select pdate,sum(ptotal) ptotal from ( select extract(month from pdate) pdate,ptotal from payment where extract(year from pdate) = extract(year from sysdate) and prefund is null )group by pdate) payment on cnt.lv=payment.pdate order by lv
